library.name: Reports
library.description: A page with customizable reporting dashboards

params.placeholder_prompts:
---
placeholder: input_date_range
label: "Date range:"
type: date_range
default: first day of this month -12 months
---
placeholder: input_date_subtotal_by
label: "By:"
type: picklist
default: month
params:
  options: [day, week, month, year]
--- 
placeholder: input_groups
label: "Groups:"
type: chooser
default:
params:
  context: group
  single: false

records.label: Created Tickets by Group Over Time

params.placeholder_prompts:
---
placeholder: input_date_range
label: 'Date range:'
type: date_range
default: first day of this month -12 months
params: []
---
placeholder: input_date_subtotal_by
label: 'By:'
type: picklist
default: month
params:
  options:
  - day
  - week
  - month
  - year
---
placeholder: input_orgs
label: 'Orgs:'
type: chooser
default: ~
params:
  context: org
  single: false

records.label: Created Tickets by Organization Over Time

params.placeholder_prompts:
---
placeholder: input_date_range
label: 'Date range:'
type: date_range
default: first day of this month -12 months
params: []
---
placeholder: input_date_subtotal_by
label: 'By:'
type: picklist
default: month
params:
  options:
  - day
  - week
  - month
  - year
---
placeholder: input_groups
label: 'Groups:'
type: chooser
default: ~
params:
  context: group
  single: false

records.label: Closed Tickets by Group Over Time

params.data_query:
type:worklist.subtotals
of:tickets
by:[closed@{{input_date_subtotal_by}},group~50]
query:(
	status:c 
	closed:"{{input_date_range}}"
	{% if input_groups %}
	group.id:[{{input_groups}}]
	{% endif %}
)
format:timeseries

type:worklist.subtotals
of:tickets
by:[group~50]
query:(
	status:c 
	closed:"{{input_date_range}}"
	{% if input_groups %}
	group.id:[{{input_groups}}]
	{% endif %}
)
format:table

params.query_required:
status:c 
created:"{{input_date_range}}" 
{% if input_groups %}
group.id:[{{input_groups}}]
{% endif %}
sort:-closed
subtotal:group.id

params.placeholder_prompts:
---
placeholder: input_date_range
label: 'Date range:'
type: date_range
default: first day of this month -12 months
params: []
---
placeholder: input_date_subtotal_by
label: 'By:'
type: picklist
default: month
params:
  options:
  - day
  - week
  - month
  - year
---
placeholder: input_workers
label: 'Workers:'
type: chooser
default: ~
params:
  context: worker
  single: false

params.data_query:
type:worklist.subtotals
of:message
by:[created@{{input_date_subtotal_by}},worker~20]
query:(
	{% if input_workers %}
	worker.id:[{{input_workers}}]
	{% else %}
	worker.id:!0 
	{% endif %}
	isOutgoing:y 
	isBroadcast:n 
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:timeseries

type:worklist.subtotals
of:message
by:[worker~50]
query:(
	{% if input_workers %}
	worker.id:[{{input_workers}}]
	{% else %}
	worker.id:!0 
	{% endif %}
	isOutgoing:y 
	isBroadcast:n 
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:table

records.label: Average Response Time by Worker Over Time

params.data_query:
type:worklist.subtotals
of:message
function:avg
by:[created@{{input_date_subtotal_by}},worker~20,responseTime]
query:(
	isOutgoing:y 
	{% if input_workers %}
	worker.id:[{{input_workers}}]
	{% else %}
	worker.id:!0 
	{% endif %}
	isBroadcast:n 
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:timeseries

type:worklist.subtotals
of:message
function:avg
by:[worker~25,responseTime]
query:(
	isOutgoing:y 
	{% if input_workers %}
	worker.id:[{{input_workers}}]
	{% else %}
	worker.id:!0 
	{% endif %}
	isBroadcast:n 
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:table

params.placeholder_prompts:
---
placeholder: input_date_range
label: 'Date range:'
type: date_range
default: first day of this month -12 months
params: []
---
placeholder: input_date_subtotal_by
label: 'By:'
type: picklist
default: month
params:
  options:
  - day
  - week
  - month
  - year
---
placeholder: input_groups
label: 'Groups:'
type: chooser
default: ~
params:
  context: group
  single: false

params.data_query:
type:worklist.subtotals
of:message
by:[created@{{input_date_subtotal_by}},group~20]
query:(
	{% if input_groups %}
	ticket:(group.id:[{{input_groups}}])
	{% endif %}
	worker.id:!0 
	isOutgoing:y 
	isBroadcast:n 
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:timeseries

type:worklist.subtotals
of:message
function:count
by:[group~25]
query:(
	{% if input_groups %}
	ticket:(group.id:[{{input_groups}}])
	{% endif %}
	worker.id:!0 
	isOutgoing:y 
	isBroadcast:n 
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:table

type:worklist.subtotals
of:message
function:avg
by:[created@{{input_date_subtotal_by}},ticket.group~20,responseTime]
query:(
	isOutgoing:y 
	{% if input_groups %}
	ticket:(group.id:[{{input_groups}}])
	{% endif %}
	isBroadcast:n 
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:timeseries

params.placeholder_prompts:
---
placeholder: input_groups
label: 'Groups:'
type: chooser
default: ~
params:
  context: group
  single: false

---
placeholder: input_date_range
label: 'Date range:'
type: date_range
default: first day of this month -12 months
params: []
---
placeholder: input_date_subtotal_by
label: 'By:'
type: picklist
default: month
params:
  options:
  - day
  - week
  - month
  - year
---
placeholder: input_activities
label: 'Activities:'
type: chooser
default: ~
params:
  context: timetracking_activity
  single: false

records.label: Time Spent by Activity Over Time

params.data_query:
type:worklist.subtotals
function:sum
of:timetracking
by:[created@{{input_date_subtotal_by}},activity,timeSpent]
query:(
	{% if input_activities %}
	activity.id:[{{input_activities}}]
	{% endif %}
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:timeseries

type:worklist.subtotals
function:sum
of:timetracking
by:[activity,timeSpent]
query:(
	{% if input_activities %}
	activity.id:[{{input_activities}}]
	{% endif %}
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:table

label: 'Date range:'

records.label: Time Spent by Org Over Time

params.data_query:
type:worklist.subtotals
of:timetracking
function:sum
by:[created@{{input_date_subtotal_by}},links.org~10,timeSpent]
query:(
	{% if input_orgs %}
	links.org:(id:[{{input_orgs}}])
	{% endif %}
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:timeseries

type:worklist.subtotals
function:sum
of:timetracking
by:[links.org,timeSpent]
query:(
	{% if input_orgs %}
	links.org:(id:[{{input_orgs}}])
	{% endif %}
	created:"{{input_date_range}}"
)
format:table

type:usage.behaviors
format:timeseries

type:usage.behaviors

params.placeholder_prompts:
---
placeholder: input_date_range
label: 'Date range:'
type: date_range
default: today -30 days
params: []

params.data_query:
type:worklist.metrics
values.attachments:(of:attachments query:())
values.bots:(of:bots query:())
values.behaviors:(of:behaviors query:())
values.tickets:(of:tickets query:(status:!d))
values.workers:(of:workers query:(isDisabled:n))
values.pages:(of:pages query:())
values.profile_widgets:(of:profile_widgets query:())
values.workspace_widgets:(of:widgets query:())
format:table
